mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET CONTENTS = #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODID = #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODDT = SYSDATE WHERE CNUM = #{cNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS WHERE CNUM = #{cNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS ( TNUM, REFNUM, CONTENTS, HCNUM, REGID, REGDT, MODID, MODDT, CLEVEL ) VALUES ( #{tNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{refNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{cLevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS WHERE CNUM = #{cNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT T1.*, T2.* FROM (SELECT B.CLEVEL AS cLevel, B.CNUM AS cNum, B.TNUM AS tNum, B.REFNUM AS refNum, B.CONTENTS AS contents, B.HCNUM AS hcNum, B.REGID AS regId, CASE TO_CHAR(B.REGDT, 'yyyy.mm.dd') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy.mm.dd') THEN TO_CHAR(B.REGDT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(B.REGDT, 'yyyy.mm.dd') END as regDt, B.MODID AS modId, B.MODDT AS modDt, B.rnum AS num FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, A.* FROM(SELECT CLEVEL, CNUM, TNUM, REFNUM, CONTENTS, HCNUM, REGID, REGDT, MODID, MODDT FROM COMMENTS WHERE REFNUM = TO_NUMBER(#{searchWord, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) START WITH HCNUM = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR CNUM = HCNUM ORDER SIBLINGS BY REGDT) A WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC} -1) + #{pageSize, jdbcType=NUMERIC}))B WHERE B.rnum >= (#{pageSize, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC} -1)+1)) T1 CROSS JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM (SELECT * FROM COMMENTS WHERE REFNUM = TO_NUMBER(#{searchWord, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ))T2
